page.title: 04CLUBS
page.content: There are over 2O clubs in Birtley. Some for over 18'S and some for younger people. The clubs for adults eg The Buffs., Catholic mens club, Birtish Legion, Rex, will sell alcohol but are not pubs. In my opinion clubs are not as tidy as pubs and not as well looked after. There are two main Youth Clubs:- Barley Mow Y.C. and Birtley Y.C., have a variety of activities are provided pool, discos, table tennis etc. These clubs give kids a place to go at nights. There are also sports clubs like swimming club, football, snooker and golf clubs. Most clubs are well run and most have money raising events for charity from time to time. St. Johns, St. Jospephs, Boys Brigade, Girls Brigade, Army Cadets, Round Table and Rotary clubs are good leisure activities.
